name: WeaveRun
description:
WeaveRun is a fantasy-esque rogue-like where your goal is to learn the game in order to make it easier. Though difficult when wandering in blind, you will learn how the mechanics work as you progress and more is revealed to you. Get to the end and claim the treasure.

Currently only available on Windows. Mac and Linux versions may become available if requested. To play the game, unzip the folder and double-click on the .exe file

Credit to Brianna Hammons and Rolemusic for the music
